full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SHES RAB SNYING PO'I SGO NAS BDUD BZLOG DANG GLUD RDZONGS BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (ZHES PA 'DI NI 'BRAS YUL @008A *, ,SKYIL TSAL MKHAN ZUR SUM PA PAndI TA YE SHES DPAL 'BYOR BA'I LEGS BSHAD SHER SNYING GI SGRUB THABS LAS SBYOR DANG BTHAS LAS SBYOR DANG BTHAS PA MUN SEL SGRON ME ZHES BYA BA LAS KHOL DU PHYUNG BA YIN ZHING, MNGA' RIS PA ZLA RGYAL GYI SLOB MA ZHANG DBU DKAR BA'I PHYAG SROL LTAR GYI 'DI'I BDUD BZLOG GI CHO GA RGYAS PA ZHIG ,PAn CHEN DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYI SLOB MA BKRA SHIS LHUN BKA' CHEN ZHIG GIS MDZAD PA ZHIG KYANG SNANG MOD KYANG, 'DI NI 'BYOR DMAN LA'ANG BYA SNA TSOGS CHUNG DON CHE BA'I LEGS BSHAD DU SNANG LA, GONG GI MGRON GZUGS BZO TSUL NI NYER MKHO ZUR GSAL RIN CHEN SGRON BU LAS BTUS ZER BA ZHIG LAS BYUNG BA LTAR BKOD PA STE, DE RGANG GIS MDZAD MA 'TSAL KYANG DE'I NANG DU GDON BGEGS SO SO'I BYED PA BSHAD TSUL SOGS NI GZHUNG CHEN MO RNAMS DAD DE TZAM MI 'GAL ZHING, LTAG TU NGER 'JIG RTEN SKYONG BA BHI ZHES PA RGYAL CHEN BZHI LA BYED PA MA'I BAD CING DGA' RAB DBANG PHYUG GI 'KHOR GTZO 'GRO BA LA 'THAB GA-YENG 'DU SHES LOG PA LHAG PAR CHAGS PA BYED PA'I 'JIG RTEN SKYONG BA BZHI LA NGOS BZUNG DGOS TSUL SMOS PA MUN SEL SGRON ME NYER DANG SHIN TU MTHUN TSABS CHE BAR YOD PA LA DPAGS NA, DE MKHAN CHEN RANG GIS MDZAD PA'AM, ,YANG NA DE'I GSUNG RGYUN LTAR BKOD PA'I GZHUNG ZHIG YIN SHAS CHE SNYAM STE RI ZHIG DE LA TSAD MAR BYAS PA LAGS SO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
